description.desc1: Loads and saves texures. The modification of textures is only black and white. The main purpose is the use for mask in combination with Texture-Effect-Nodes.
description.desc2: The saved texture will be a PNG.

render pass.descript: render pass. default is a manual render pass since the loaded texture needs only passed on once because of its static nature.

texture setup.descript:
Internally the texture is handled as a 1-channel bw-texture. the texture setup defines how the black/white values are set for a 4-channel ARGB texture. 
	<li>dddd will set all channels to the bw-values. 
	<li>dwww will only set the Alpha-channel to the bw-value, while the RGB-channels will be set to white (1.0) 
	<li>wddd will set the Alpha-channel to white and the RGB-channels to the bw-value.

edit.descript: sets the focus of the editor window to this node

preset dims.descript: preset dimensions. used to populate dimX and dimY.

filewatch.descript: reloads texture automatically if file changes.

Notes.note1: After a modification of the texture with the editor, the file needs to be saved, otherwise the changes get lost.
